div.bibl: The Chicago Abendpost, September 26, 1907. FOR THE GERMAN HOSPITAL.

body.p: A bazaar was opened yesterday in Kretlow' s Hall, 401 Webster Avenue,arranged by the "Sewing and Aid Society of the German Hospital," in aid of this institution. The beginning was very favorable. It brought many guests, who were entertained by the many good performers. The visitors not only admired the workmenship of the exhibited wares, but also bought some of them.
